title: Missing Snake Scroll Icon

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: During Chinese New Year in 2013, there was a snake scroll icon you could get by playing a match with a premade of 5. After choosing it as my summoner icon ever since, today it has went missing and has been replaced by black.

replies.body:
It's strange that your icon is showing as blank, so I took a look into this for you and see that it's still on your account!  Your might have corrupt assets or game files that's preventing you from seeing it.  You may need to run a [repair](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+)  to get that fixed up.  You may also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to automatically set your client to a clean state.  I hope that helps put you at ease!

Also, I looked up your profile on the client and verified the icon is still showing.  :D
Haha yeah! I just logged on today and it fixed itself! Thanks for the support!
